languages.text: Температура на планете ниже допустимой отметки и продолжает падать каждые несколько часов, что приравнивает мир к классу "мертвых". Рекомендуется сканирование поверхности для поиска возможных свидетелей катаклизма.

traits.locale_text: Температура на планете ниже допустимой отметки и продолжает падать каждые несколько часов, что приравнивает мир к классу "мертвых". Рекомендуется сканирование поверхности для поиска возможных свидетелей катаклизма.

languages.text: The planet's temperature is below acceptable levels and continues to drop every few hours, effectively rendering the planet a "dead" world. The Rogue Trader should scan the surface to try to find any witnesses to the cataclysm.
languages.original_text: Температура на планете ниже допустимой отметки и продолжает падать каждые несколько часов, что приравнивает мир к классу "мертвых". Рекомендуется сканирование поверхности для поиска возможных свидетелей катаклизма.

traits.locale_text: The planet's temperature is below acceptable levels and continues to drop every few hours, effectively rendering the planet a "dead" world. The Rogue Trader should scan the surface to try to find any witnesses to the cataclysm.

The planet's temperature is below acceptable levels and continues to drop every few hours, effectively rendering the planet a "dead" world. The Rogue Trader should scan the surface to try to find any witnesses to the cataclysm.

The planet's temperature is below acceptable levels and continues to drop every few hours, effectively rendering the planet a "dead" world. The Rogue Trader should scan the surface to try to find any witnesses to the cataclysm.

The planet's temperature is below acceptable levels and continues to drop every few hours, effectively rendering the planet a "dead" world. The Rogue Trader should scan the surface to try to find any witnesses to the cataclysm.

languages.text: 这颗行星的温度低于人类可以生存的水平，而且每隔几个小时便会继续下降。因此，这颗行星实际上已经沦为了死寂世界。行商浪人应该扫描行星表面，寻找有没有人在这场灾变中幸存下来。
languages.original_text: The planet's temperature is below acceptable levels and continues to drop every few hours, effectively rendering the planet a "dead" world. The Rogue Trader should scan the surface to try to find any witnesses to the cataclysm.

traits.locale_text: 这颗行星的温度低于人类可以生存的水平，而且每隔几个小时便会继续下降。因此，这颗行星实际上已经沦为了死寂世界。行商浪人应该扫描行星表面，寻找有没有人在这场灾变中幸存下来。

languages.text: 惑星の温度は許容レベルを下回っている。数時間ごとに下がり続けており、事実上惑星を「死」の惑星にしている。自由開拓者は地表をスキャンして、大惨事の目撃者を見つけ出さなければならない。
languages.original_text: The planet's temperature is below acceptable levels and continues to drop every few hours, effectively rendering the planet a "dead" world. The Rogue Trader should scan the surface to try to find any witnesses to the cataclysm.

traits.locale_text: 惑星の温度は許容レベルを下回っている。数時間ごとに下がり続けており、事実上惑星を「死」の惑星にしている。自由開拓者は地表をスキャンして、大惨事の目撃者を見つけ出さなければならない。

languages.text: La temperatura del planeta está por debajo de los niveles aceptables y sigue bajando cada pocas horas, lo que convierte al planeta en un mundo muerto. {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente debería escanear la superficie en busca de testigos del cataclismo.
languages.original_text: The planet's temperature is below acceptable levels and continues to drop every few hours, effectively rendering the planet a "dead" world. The Rogue Trader should scan the surface to try to find any witnesses to the cataclysm.

traits.locale_text: La temperatura del planeta está por debajo de los niveles aceptables y sigue bajando cada pocas horas, lo que convierte al planeta en un mundo muerto. {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente debería escanear la superficie en busca de testigos del cataclismo.

languages.text: Die Temperatur des Planeten liegt unterhalb der akzeptablen Werte und sinkt alle paar Stunden weiter, wodurch der Planet als "tote" Welt eingestuft werden muss. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} sollte die Oberfläche scannen, um Zeugen der Katastrophe zu finden.
languages.original_text: The planet's temperature is below acceptable levels and continues to drop every few hours, effectively rendering the planet a "dead" world. The Rogue Trader should scan the surface to try to find any witnesses to the cataclysm.

traits.locale_text: Die Temperatur des Planeten liegt unterhalb der akzeptablen Werte und sinkt alle paar Stunden weiter, wodurch der Planet als "tote" Welt eingestuft werden muss. {mf|Der Freihänder|Die Freihändlerin} sollte die Oberfläche scannen, um Zeugen der Katastrophe zu finden.

languages.text: La température de la planète se trouve en dessous des niveaux supportables et continue de baisser d'heure en heure, faisant de la planète un monde « mort ». {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} devrait scanner la surface pour tenter de trouver un témoin du cataclysme.
languages.original_text: The planet's temperature is below acceptable levels and continues to drop every few hours, effectively rendering the planet a "dead" world. The Rogue Trader should scan the surface to try to find any witnesses to the cataclysm.

traits.locale_text: La température de la planète se trouve en dessous des niveaux supportables et continue de baisser d'heure en heure, faisant de la planète un monde « mort ». {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} devrait scanner la surface pour tenter de trouver un témoin du cataclysme.

languages.text: Gezegenin ısısı, kabul edilebilir seviyelerin altında. Her birkaç saatte bir sıcaklık düşerek gezegeni "ölü" dünyaya dönüştürüyor. Hür Tacir, yaşanan felaketin tanıklarını bulabilmek için yüzeyi taramalı.
languages.original_text: The planet's temperature is below acceptable levels and continues to drop every few hours, effectively rendering the planet a "dead" world. The Rogue Trader should scan the surface to try to find any witnesses to the cataclysm.

traits.locale_text: Gezegenin ısısı kabul edilebilir seviyelerin altında ve her birkaç saatte bir düşerek gezegeni "ölü" bir dünya hâline getiriyor. Hür Tacir yaşanan felaketin tanıklarını bulabilmek için yüzeyi taramalı.
